name: Mead And Glory
description:
DESCRIPTION

A short platformer made to test your determination :)

Scale the tower to obtain the Mead.
While climbing you will get coins you can
upgrade your gear with at the shop.
On your way up you will see a few 
different challenges including a
FINAL BOSS.

THOUGHTS

It's not supposed to be a rage game, it just sort of became one.
You will feel like this after beating it:

The game was made in a month's time. Hence the size. But I would like to make a deeper iteration of the project in the future. If you have any suggestions, I would love to hear them out. But no multiplayer...that's too hard.  >:|
